articles.title: Chinese startup DeepSeek releases upgraded AI model
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek on Thursday released DeepSeek-V3.1, an upgraded model with hybrid inference structure, faster thinking speed and stronger agent capability, the company said in a statement published on WeChat.
articles.translated_title: Chinese startup DeepSeek releases upgraded AI model

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg Halts AI Hiring After Million-Dollar Talent Poaching Sparks Investor Backlash Amid Meta's 'Superintelligence Efforts:' Report
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. has implemented a hiring freeze in its artificial intelligence division following months of aggressive recruitment.

articles.title: Commonwealth Bank of Australia Reverses Job Cuts Decision Over AI Chatbots
articles.summary: Commonwealth Bank of Australia reversed a decision to cut 45 customer service roles due to new artificial intelligence technology after pressure from the country’s main financial services union.

articles.summary: Google unveiled a new line-up of four Pixel 10 model smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence features.

articles.title: Google’s Pixel 10 phones raises ante on artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Google unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that’s designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they’re being taken.

articles.title: Restaurant battles fake deals offered by Google AI: ‘It’s coming back on us’
articles.summary: A restaurant in Missouri said an artificial intelligence tool designed to enhance Google search results is causing confusion for customers.
